name: tiny-buffer
description: A tiny isomorphic implementation of a large subset of Node's Buffer.

scripts.benchmark: node tasks/benchmark/bracket-notation.js && node tasks/benchmark/concat.js && node tasks/benchmark/copy-big.js && node tasks/benchmark/copy.js && node tasks/benchmark/new-big.js && node tasks/benchmark/new.js && node tasks/benchmark/readDoubleBE.js && node tasks/benchmark/readFloatBE.js && node tasks/benchmark/readUInt32LE.js && node tasks/benchmark/slice.js && node tasks/benchmark/writeFloatBE.js
scripts.test: npm run test:buffer && npm run test:native
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run test
